conclusion: Analyze the image to determine the trajectory of object A and predict collisions.

Object A is identified as the small orange sphere falling from above.
Given the angle of descent and absence of obstacles, A will likely follow a straight path towards the table.

A will first encounter the green block, followed by the orange block, then the blue block, and finally the yellow block.
Since the blocks are stationary and there are no visible forces deflecting A, it will continue along its path.
A will land on the yellow block, as it is the last block in the line.
A will collide with the green, orange, blue, and yellow blocks in sequence and land on the yellow block.
